docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Nest Mini (1st Gen) shell build
docs.text: The Nest Mini is made up of three main components: the base, the speaker disc, and the fabric diffuser. All parts are held together using T6 Torx screws.

docs.title: Base
docs.text: The base has a rubber pad underneath to prevent the device from sliding. To remove it, gently lift the more solid part of the base—avoid prying under the rubber itself, as this can tear it.

docs.title: Speaker Disc
docs.text: The speaker disc is a single module that occupies most of the internal space. There’s nothing else inside except the speaker itself.

docs.title: Fabric Diffuser
docs.text: ⚠️ Do not wash this! Washing can dissolve the glue holding the fabric to the plastic frame, causing it to detach. Reattaching it is very difficult (ask me how i know...).
